data.chText: 情况；状况；形势；局面
data.enText: all the circumstances and things that are happening at a particular time and in a particular place

data.chText: 处境困难
data.enText: to be in a difficult situation

data.chText: 你可能遇上一种情况，使你不得不立刻作出决定。
data.enText: You could get into a situation where you have to decide immediately.

data.chText: 我们都遇到过类似的尴尬局面。
data.enText: We have all been in similar embarrassing situations.

data.chText: 目前的经济、财政、政治等形势
data.enText: the present economic/financial/political, etc. situation

data.chText: 他找不到摆脱困境的出路。
data.enText: He could see no way out of the situation.

data.chText: 假如我是你的话，我会另找工作。
data.enText: In your situation, I would look for another job.

data.chText: 我们在这里所面临的是一个危急局面。
data.enText: What we have here is a crisis situation.

data.chText: 我处在一种注定要失败的境地。
data.enText: I'm in a no-win situation (= whatever I do will be bad for me) .

data.chText: （建筑物或城镇的）地理位置，环境特点
data.enText: the kind of area or surroundings that a building or town has

data.chText: 小城坐落在一个宽阔而草木苍翠的河谷中，环境宜人。
data.enText: The town is in a delightful situation in a wide green valley.

data.chText: 职业；工作岗位

data.enText: or
a job

data.chText: 招聘（报刊中的招聘广告栏）
data.enText: Situations Vacant (= the title of the section in a newspaper where jobs are advertised)

data.text: environment ♦ setting ♦ surroundings ♦ background ♦ backdrop ♦ situation

data.chText: 以上各词均指人或事物生存或所处的环境。
data.enText: These are all words for the type of place in which sb/sth exists or is situated.
environment

data.chText: 指影响人或事物的行为或发展的环境：
data.enText: the conditions in a place that affect the behaviour and development of sb/sth

data.chText: 不幸的家庭环境可能对孩子的行为造成影响。
data.enText: An unhappy home environment can affect children's behaviour.

data.chText: 令人愉快的工作环境
data.enText: a pleasant working environment
setting

data.chText: 指事情发生或所处的环境、背景：
data.enText: a place or situation of a particular type, in which sth happens or exists

data.chText: 这岛为音乐会提供了优美的田园布景。
data.enText: The island provided an idyllic setting for the concert.
surroundings

data.chText: 指周围的环境：
data.enText: everything that is around or near sb/sth

data.chText: 这些棚屋与周围的环境浑然一体，非常和谐。
data.enText: The huts blend in perfectly with their surroundings.
background

data.chText: 指对主体事物起衬托作用的景物、背景：
data.enText: the things or area that are/is behind or around the main objects or people that are in a place or picture

data.chText: 远处的山峦白雪覆盖。
data.enText: The mountains in the background were capped with snow.
backdrop

data.chText: 指事情发生的环境或对主体事物起衬托作用的背景：
data.enText: ( formal ) the scenery surrounding an event; the things or area behind the main objects in a place

data.chText: 活动在雄伟的阿特拉斯山脉举行。
data.enText: The events took place against the dramatic backdrop of the Atlas mountains.
situation

data.chText: 指城镇或建筑物的地理位置、环境特点：
data.enText: ( rather formal ) the type of area or surroundings that a town or building has

data.chText: 小城坐落在宽阔而草木苍翠的山谷中，环境优美。
data.enText: The town is in a beautiful situation in a wide green valley.
in (a/an) environment/setting/surroundings/situation
against a/the background/backdrop (of sth)
a (good, etc.) environment/setting/situation for sth
(a/an) new/unfamiliar environment/setting/surroundings
sb/sth's immediate environment/setting/surroundings
(a) dramatic setting/surroundings/background/backdrop

data.text: situation ♦ circumstances ♦ position ♦ conditions ♦ the case ♦ state of affairs

data.chText: 以上各词均指情况、状况。
data.enText: These are all words for the conditions and facts that are connected with and affect the way things are.
situation

data.chText: 指情况、状况、形势、局面：
data.enText: all the things that are happening at a particular time and in a particular place

data.chText: 目前的经济形势
data.enText: the present economic situation
circumstances

data.chText: 指条件、环境、状况、境况、（尤指）经济状况：
data.enText: the facts that are connected with and affect a situation, an event or an action; the conditions of a person's life, especially the money they have

data.chText: 那艘船神秘地沉没了。
data.enText: The ship sank in mysterious circumstances.
position

data.chText: 指处境、地位、状况：
data.enText: the situation that sb is in, especially when it affects what they can and cannot do

data.chText: 她觉得她自己有权力。
data.enText: She felt she was in a position of power.
conditions

data.chText: 指居住、工作或做事情的环境、境况、条件，影响某事发生的物质环境、状态、条件：
data.enText: the circumstances in which people live, work or do things; the physical situation that affects how sth happens

data.chText: 我们被迫在户外天寒地冻的环境下工作。
data.enText: We were forced to work outside in freezing conditions.

data.chText: 用circumstances还是conditions？
circumstances指人的经济状况；conditions指人的食宿状况。circumstances指影响某事的周边环境；conditions通常指影响某事的物质环境，如天气。
data.enText: Circumstances refers to sb's financial situation; conditions are things such as the quality and amount of food or shelter they have. The circumstances that affect an event are the facts surrounding it; the conditions that affect it are usually physical ones, such as the weather.
circumstances or conditions?
the case

data.chText: 指实情、事实：
data.enText: the true situation

data.chText: 如果真是那样，我们就需要更多的员工了。
data.enText: If that is the case (= if the situation described is true) , we need more staff.
state of affairs

data.chText: 指事态、情况、形势：
data.enText: a situation

data.chText: 这种不幸的情况是怎么发生的呢？
data.enText: How did this unhappy state of affairs come about?

data.chText: 用situation还是state of affairs？
state of affairs多与this连用，亦与表示形势好坏的形容词（如happy、sorry、shocking、sad和unhappy）以及与时间有关的形容词（如present和current）连用。situation常用得多，且用于更广泛的语境中。
data.enText: State of affairs is mostly used with this . It also occurs with adjectives describing how good or bad a situation is, such as happy , sorry , shocking , sad and unhappy , as well as those relating to time, such as present and current . Situation is much more frequent and is used in a wider variety of contexts.
situation or state of affairs?
to be in (a) particular situation/circumstances/position/state of affairs
the/sb's economic/financial/social situation/circumstances/position/conditions
an awkward/embarrassing situation/position/state of affairs
to be faced with a situation/circumstances/a position/conditions/a state of affairs
A situation/state of affairs arises/develops/improves/changes/deteriorates.
Circumstances/conditions arise/develop/improve/change/deteriorate.

means: (建筑物或城镇的)地理位置，环境特点

example: he occupied a post in the treasury

tr: physical position in relation to the surroundings
example: the sites are determined by highly specific sequences of nucleotides

tr: a condition or position in which you find yourself
example: the unpleasant situation (or position) of having to choose between two evils
found herself in a very fortunate situation

tr: the combination of circumstances at a given time
example: the present international situation is dangerous
wondered how such a state of affairs had come about
eternal truths will be neither true nor eternal unless they have fresh meaning for every new social situation"- Franklin D.Roosevel

tr: a complex or critical or unusual difficulty

value.def: You use situation to refer generally to what is happening in a particular place at a particular time, or to refer to what is happening to you.

example.ex: Army officers said the situation was under control...
example.tran: 陆军军官称局面已经得到了控制。

example.ex: And now for a look at the travel situation in the rest of the country...
example.tran: 现在再来看一下该国家其他地方的旅游情况。

example.ex: If you want to improve your situation you must adopt a positive mental attitude.
example.tran: 如果你打算改变自己的境遇，就必须树立一种积极的心态。

gramarinfo.label: usu with supp, oft poss N

value.def: The situation of a building or town is the kind of surroundings that it has.

example.ex: The garden is in a beautiful situation on top of a fold in the rolling Hampshire landscape.
example.tran: 这座花园位于地势连绵起伏的汉普郡的一处山岗上，环境十分优美。

value.def: Situations Vacant is the title of a column or page in a newspaper where jobs are advertised.
value.tran: (报纸上的招聘广告栏或招聘页标题)招聘

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 Employment

trans: 市场情况；市场现状；市场形势；情境；市场状况

社交场合；社会情境；社会情景；社会境况；社會情境
竞争环境；竞争情况；竞争态势
